descriptionHtml:
[b][size=20][color=red]OVERLORD[/color][/size][/b]




[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/124715-1342589376.jpg[/img]



[size=10]Description[/size]

I converted Oblivion Overlord armor mod(made by ??????? ) to Skyrim. and add some retexture, glowing effect.
Helmet was made by me.
Originate from Overlord 2 (pc game). 

Two Armor sets for male. (This mod doesn\'t have female mesh, but you can try... )

Normal version armor set is steel material. 

Original version armor set is Daedric material(not daedric armor. this is standalone mod)
and that has glowing eyes(helmet and gauntlets).

This item can weight slide. (it is fitted to vanilla male body mesh)

Khajjit, Orc and Argonian also can use this mode ( see the screenshot )

And.... Boss Creature \'Overlord\' in Ustengrav Dungeon.




[size=10]Installation[/size]

Unpack file to skyrim data folder by 7zip . and check the overlord mod in launcher




[size=10]How to obtain[/size]

You can craft Normal version armor set at the Smithing Forge (Steel Tab). 

If you want get the Original armor set, you have to go to Ustengrav.
 
<see the movie>
[youtube]G08sz60z4ns[/youtube]


If you defeat the Overlord, you can get that armor set.

All overlord armor sets can be encahnted at the enchant table, and improve armor rating at the armor table.





See the movie. Special Thanks to avion, INSANE OH FLEX , SkyrimSpotlights

[youtube]NerlX3dmhU0[/youtube]     [youtube]JP_QaYlk1J0[/youtube] 





[size=10]Credits[/size]

??????? (Russian moder) -  [url=http://www.anvilbay.ru/files/overlord2-minion-armor]Overlord armor mode(oblivion)[/url]
- Nice mesh and texture. I love it.

??? namo2813 (naver elder7 cafe) - Overlord boss creature
- He created Overlord Boss Creature.
- Check his other modes : [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=79602988]warplus[/url]

??? rhaehf2004 (naver elder7 cafe)
- Nice screenshots.

Bethesda Softworks
- Thanks for Great Games.

Triumph studio
- Overlord 2 Pc game




[b][size=10]Permission[/size][/b]

You are free to use this Helmet. You do not need my permission to use it.
But other parts of armor can\'t be permitted by me. ??????? has All credits.



[b][size=10]Update Note[/size][/b]
@ Overlord Armor mod file 
- I upload armor mod(No Dungeon Boss)
- In this armor mod, You can get all kinds of Overlord armor at smithing forge
- I add light armor version also.
- Check the steel, daedric and dragon tab.
- You must have proper perk(daedric and dragon smithing) for making Original and Light sets.
- Check the Main file.

@ v1.2 Update
- If you defeat overlord, you can get summon minion spellbook.
- Multisoul ability was enchanted in helm.
- Minions are small draugrs.
- check new screenshoots.
author: aodnagne and namo2813
